definition: to take drastic measures to deal with a situation/to pull the carpet from under sb
kettle/cauldron
(equivalent to 的 as possessive particle)
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash
fuel/salary

sentences.english: (Is China clueless about North Korea?) In Afghanistan, the Taliban's momentum will be broken.
sentences.chinese: 在阿富汗，塔利班的動力將被釜底抽薪。

sentences.english: In order to turn things around, only the most powerful tank consulting blow up.
sentences.chinese: 爲了扭轉局勢，唯有釜底抽薪炸掉威力最大的坦克。

sentences.english: In Afghanistan, the Taliban's momentum will be broken.
sentences.chinese: 在阿富汗，塔利班的動力將被釜底抽薪。

definition: to kill two birds with one stone (idiom)
a deliberate show of strength as a warning
delaying tactics/stalling/measures to stave off an attack/stratagem to win a respite
to lend sb a knife to kill sb/to get sb else to do one's dirty work/to attack using the strength of another (idiom)
lit. to besiege 魏[Wei4] and rescue 趙|赵[Zhao4] (idiom)/fig. to relieve a besieged ally by attacking the home base of the besiegers
lit. to paint holding two brushes (idiom); fig. to work on two tasks at the same time/to attack one problem from two angles at the same time
lit. drinking poison in the hope of quenching one's thirst (idiom)/fig. a supposed remedy that only makes matters worse
lit. to pull a snake from its hole/to expose a malefactor (idiom)
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
to defeat the enemy by capturing their chief (idiom)
lit. one arrow, two golden eagles (idiom)/to kill two birds with one stone
to threaten the east and strike to the west (idiom)/to create a diversion
lit. to kill a chicken in front of a monkey; fig. to make an example of sb (by punishment) to frighten others
lit. kill one to warn a hundred (idiom); to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
to lure the tiger from its domain in the mountains (idiom)/to lure an enemy away from his territory
